metadata.inclusion:
Device ADD for Inclusion
- Click [Add] icon in Z-Wave Controller .
- Press the Net_Button for between 2 and 30 seconds, Green LED is Blinking one time every 300 milliseconds.
- If Inclusion Process is successful, Green led will turn off.
metadata.exclusion:
Device Remove for Exclusion
- Click [Remove] icon in Z-Wave Controller
- Press the Net_Button for between 2 and 30 seconds, Green LED is Blinking one time every 300 milliseconds.
metadata.reset:
-Long press Net_Button for more than 30 seconds in the product. 
- Device Reset Locally notification is Transmitted.Green led is turn on for 2.5 secondsï¼Œthen turn off.

. Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
